comment.author: 58594357@N00
comment._content: Et le monument est toujours là, et toujours aussi beau!

comment.author: 44124372652@N01
comment._content: This statue was created by my great-grandfather, Louis-Phillipe Hebert. One would think that both here and in the text on your website, that as a museum, you might have thought it appropriate to mention the name of the artist, especially as M. Hebert was/is such and important artist in the artistic and cultural life of Montreal and Quebec.
